医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
地中海饮食干预可能无法改善高危患者的乳腺癌预后研究人员讨论了一项随机对照试验的结果，以探索饮食对乳腺癌复发的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Mediterranean-diet-intervention-may-not-improve-breast-cancer-prognosis-in-high-risk-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Mediterranean-diet-intervention-may-not-improve-breast-cancer-prognosis-in-high-risk-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bd689d​​ba-cce2-49f1-9d70-bde9ee7159b0 Fri, 20 Oct 2023 06:07:00 -0400 Mediterranean diet intervention may not improve breast cancer prognosis in high-risk patients
喝咖啡可以降低偏头痛的风险，但不能降低其他神经系统疾病的风险研究人员利用孟德尔随机化建立了咖啡消费与偏头痛风险降低之间的因果关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Coffee-conspiration-reduces-risk-of-migraines-but-not-other-neurological-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Coffee-conspiration-reduces-risk-of-migraines-but-not-other-neurological-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4e58c663-ea32-40f6-9cdc-7575621130cf Fri, 20 Oct 2023 06:01:00 -0400 Coffee consumption reduces risk of migraines, but not other neurological diseases

高致病性禽流感的生态和进化变化是否预示着另一场大流行威胁？研究人员报告称，高致病性禽流感H5病毒的生态和进化发生了显着变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Are-ecological-and-evolutionary-shifts-in-highly-pathogenic-avian-influenza-pointing-to-another-pandemic-threat.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Are-ecological-and-evolutionary-shifts-in-highly-pathogenic-avian-influenza-pointing-to-another-pandemic-threat.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5fe326c4-7dc5-46b9-a8be-48785e51e462 Fri, 20 Oct 2023 04:10:00 -0400 Are ecological and evolutionary shifts in highly pathogenic avian influenza pointing to another pandemic threat?
氯胺酮治疗如何产生持久的抗抑郁作用研究人员通过检查氯胺酮与 NMDAR 的相互作用，讨论了氯胺酮持续抗抑郁作用的机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/How-ketamine-treatment-elicits-long- permanent-anti-depressive-effects.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/How-ketamine-treatment-elicits-long- permanent-anti-depressive-effects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f94799e4-0f8f-4ea4-826e-9792cc3624cd Fri, 20 Oct 2023 03:59:00 -0400 How ketamine treatment elicits long-lasting anti-depressive effects
研究发现抗生素治疗后营养不良的尼日尔儿童肠道微生物群更加成熟营养不良威胁着数百万 5 岁以下儿童的生命，每年导致低收入和中等收入国家约 50 万人死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231019/Study-finds-more-mature-gut-microbiome-in-malnourished-Nigerien-children-after-antibiotic-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231019/Study-finds-more-mature-gut-microbiome-in-malnourished-Nigerien-children-after-antibiotic-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=336df3f8-6191-4dd1-b8a7-38148b0a2b64 Thu, 19 Oct 2023 23:31:00 -0400 Study finds more mature gut microbiome in malnourished Nigerien children after antibiotic treatment
新研究调查了创伤后应激障碍、饮食和肠道微生物组之间的关系人类肠道微生物组对我们的健康有重大影响。研究表明，它可以影响情绪的发展和反应，但创伤后应激障碍 (PTSD) 与肠道微生物群之间的关系尚未被探索。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231019/New-study-investigates-the-relationship- Between-PTSD-diet-and-the-gut-microbiome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231019/New-study-investigates-the-relationship- Between-PTSD-diet-and-the-gut-microbiome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b343be21-dc84-4345-a897-0db184711ca1 Thu, 19 Oct 2023 23:21:03 -0400 New study investigates the relationship between PTSD, diet, and the gut microbiome
持续缺乏睡眠可能会增加出现抑郁症状的风险伦敦大学学院研究人员领导的一项新的基因研究表明，每晚持续睡眠少于五个小时可能会增加出现抑郁症状的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231019/Consistent-lack-of-sleep-may-raise-the-risk-of-developmenting-depressive-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231019/Consistent-lack-of-sleep-may-raise-the-risk-of-developmenting-depressive-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d01aaf2e-025e-4455-9bf1-1e5d833ca82f Thu, 19 Oct 2023 23:16:10 -0400 Consistent lack of sleep may raise the risk of developing depressive symptoms
